item.description:
Chris and Cat are both on hiatus from Sushi...I have gotten some requests to try somewhere new, and we have not been to Mikado yet. I was excited to learn they have a party room! And it is reserved for us on April 26th!

This is right in downtown Middletown...near the intersection of Main and Washington Streets...you enter in the back...parking in back...convenient to Rt. 9...and Rt. 66 (Washington Street).

See you there!

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Spring is here in the Mikado party room!
